<br>
因为买了托竹，20年买的小鲁班就一直吃灰了，本来想改成激光雕刻机但是激光头很贵。刚好最近写请帖，就想能不能折腾一下改成机器写。<br>
（本帖只作为个人经验、如有更便捷方法请指点）<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<font size="6">一、准备工作</font><br>
1.小鲁班3D打印机（能打印.gcode文件的应该都可以）<br>
2.圆珠笔0.5最佳（按压式、有弹簧的更佳）<br>
3.奎享雕刻软件（链接在结尾）<br>
4.固定笔的打印件<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<font size="6">二、教程开始</font><br>
<strong><font size="5">1.硬件准备</font></strong><br>
机器刚启动后应回一次原点（识别一次XYZ的量程和位置）<br>
<br>
如果是按压笔，请把弹簧抽出放到笔的末尾<br>
<img id="aimg_YtnJT" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/28444.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/28444.jpg"><br>
<br>
让笔尖有弹性伸缩<br>
<img id="aimg_k7uS8" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1080" height="1080" file="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/457484.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" style="cursor:pointer" border="0" alt="" src="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/457484.jpg"><br>
<br>
用机器控制Z轴升起一定高度（<font color="#0000ff">这里设置为<strong>4</strong>，为降笔高度</font>），放入纸张。并且笔尖刚好能够接触到纸张并且有部分压力，将笔固定在挤出头。（因为不想拆卸原来组装，所以我打印了一个附加件）<br>
保证挤出头一定是高于笔的<br>
<img id="aimg_CB2oN" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/712504.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/712504.jpg"><br>
<br>
用机器控制Z轴再升起一定高度（<font color="#ff0000">这里设置为<strong>6</strong>，为提笔高度</font>），让笔尖脱离纸张。<br>
<img id="aimg_VK5W5" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/387905.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/387905.jpg"><br>
<br>
将机器的X和Y回到0坐标查看热床和挤出头的位置<br>
<img id="aimg_yu6is" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1006" height="1188" file="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/591052.jpg" border="0" alt="" src="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/591052.jpg"><br>
<br>
<br>
可以看出平台的XY轴关系为<br>
Y125<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
Y0/X0&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;X125<br>
<br>
<font size="5"><br>
</font><br>
<strong><font size="5">2.软件准备</font></strong><br>
解压软件压缩包，将crack解压替换奎享雕刻安装目录。（感谢@永恒陌 的奎享雕刻1.7.8大刀阔斧的<a href="https://www.52pojie.cn" target="_blank" class="relatedlink">破解</a>记录 - <a href="https://www.52pojie.cn" target="_blank" class="relatedlink">吾爱破解</a> - 52pojie.cn）<br>
打开软件默认机器直接进入即可、<br>
<br>
<br>
【设置】-【坐标系】根据刚才观察的XY坐标系修改（我的XY0点在热床的左下角我就改为左下角）<br>
<img id="aimg_ktYLk" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/920700.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/920700.jpg"><br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
更改画宽高为打印机尺寸，页边距等根据需要修改，字体需要自己选择。我设置的页边距80大概是热床的中间位置，具体参数设置我还没弄太明白，大家可以自行设置。<u>注意：每次更改完一定要点左上角更新，才能看到更改后的内容。</u><br>
<img id="aimg_n9U8b" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/469711.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/469711.jpg"><br>
<br>
<br>
编辑内容，写完内容后导出 <br>
<img id="aimg_gm7wY" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/373892.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/373892.jpg"><br>
<br>
导出&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>
<img id="aimg_h0mDV" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/305476.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/305476.jpg"><br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<strong><font size="4">记事本打开导出的&nbsp;&nbsp;.gcode&nbsp;&nbsp;文件，替换里面内容</font></strong><strong><font size="4">替换开头代码</font></strong><br>
<img id="aimg_Fk4p7" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/559480.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/559480.jpg"><br>
开头代码 替换为（大概意思是让XYZ回原点）：<br>
<br>
G00 S1; endstops<br>
G00 E0; no extrusion<br>
G01 S1; endstops<br>
G01 E0; no extrusion<br>
G21; millimeters<br>
G91 G0 F300.0 Z20.000; pen park !!Zsafe<br>
G90; absolute<br>
G28 X; home<br>
G28 Y; home<br>
G28 Z; home<br>
G00 F300.0 Z26.400; pen park !!Zpark<br>
G00 F2400.0 Y0.000; !!Ybottom<br>
G00 F2400.0 X0.000; !!Xleft<br>
<br>
注意不要多行或者少行，不要将<font color="#008000"><font style="background-color:yellow">开头代码</font></font>这几个字复制进去。<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<strong><font size="4">替换降笔代码</font></strong><br>
M3S1000<img id="aimg_G4lK4" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/55416.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/55416.jpg"><br>
<br>
降笔代码有多个，需要 <font color="#008000"><font style="background-color:yellow">全部替换：</font></font><br>
<br>
G00 F300.0<font color="#0000ff"><strong> Z4.000</strong></font>; pen down !!Zwork<br>
<br>
注意此处的4和硬件准备时的4是一样的<br>
这个4可以根据纸张厚度、笔尖位置自行修改！<br>
这里Z4为Z轴 <u>下降</u> 到4的位置是笔尖 <u>接触</u> 纸张的位置。<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<font size="4"><strong>替换升笔代码</strong></font><br>
M5<img id="aimg_chUHu" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/505009.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/505009.jpg"><br>
升笔代码有多个，需要 <font color="#008000"><font style="background-color:yellow">全部替换：</font></font><br>
<br>
G00 F300.0 <font color="#ff0000"><strong>Z6.000</strong></font>; pen up !!Zup<br>
<br>
注意此处的6和硬件准备时的6是一样的<br>
这个6可以根据纸张厚度、笔尖位置自行修改！<br>
这里Z6为Z轴 <u>上升 </u>到6的位置是笔尖 <u>离开 </u>纸张的位置。<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<font size="4"><strong>替换结尾</strong></font><br>
G90G0 X0Y0<br>
<img id="aimg_oTyMm" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/509585.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="http://forumupload.ru/uploads/001c/66/4b/2/509585.jpg">结尾代码为1个，删除前面的G90即可<br>
<br>
G0 X0Y0<br>
<br>
如果不做处理，写字完成后笔不会自回到XY的0点，还会停留在纸张上，可能会漏墨<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
